creator: CanaryDroid
descriptionHtml:
Don't be shy, we know you can't get enough fun 2048 games! Drop down the numbers, merge them and get to 2048 in Merge Numbers today!

When two or more blocks with the same number touch, they merge into one. The number blocks don't stay in place: they descend onto the playing field! The game ends when the playing field is filled.

Merge Numbers Features:
- A new unique taste in 2048 with realistic wood tile design
- Authentic graphics and satisfying sound effects
- Enjoy an ever-growing collection of 1024 2048 4096 8192...
- Use bombs to blast the board
- Train your brain
- No WIFI required, playable offline so you can enjoy this classic anywhere
descriptionShort: Drop down the numbers, merge them and get to 2048 now!
